name: Spaceguy Jones
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2018 "GENRE without MECHANIC".

We made a platform shooter where you cannot kill enemies, but have to use a unique weapon to get them to kill each other. We also flipped the traditional health system on it's head so that the only way to get health is by keeping stunned enemies alive.

Controls
Controller:

Move: Joypad |  D-pad
Gun: X | B | Right Trigger
Jetpack: A | Y | Left Trigger

Keyboard:

Move: WASD | Arrow keys
Gun: F
Jetpack: Space

Switch weapons: 1 | 2
